thread.title: selfie cam bug?

comments.text: hey philipp, selfie stick i made is only able to transmit to itself sometimes. are you able to take a look? i'll leave a stick in future skills for you to test out
sorry, is this issue solved in the meantime? we fixed some bugs with that in a past update
new video module has effected one of our older demo areas needed tomorrow ... i made you editor in private area named fs-make yourself known
the selfie stick and billboard and friend screen are all not working properly for us
thanks, we now fixed some cam issues in the latest updates, pls let me know if any issues persist!

thread.latestCommentText: thanks, we now fixes some cam issues in the latest updates, pls let me know if any issues persist!
